title: Get all replies to a comment

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

parameters.name: video_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for owned TikTok video to list comments on. This can be accessed via the /business/video/list/ endpoint as the item_id for each video listed.

parameters.name: comment_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier for comment on an owned TikTok video to list replies on. This can be accessed via the /business/comment/list/ endpoint as the comment_id for each comment listed.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Enumerated status of comment reply visibility. Enum values : PUBLIC : Comment replies are publicly viewable by all TikTok users. ALL : Comment replies are both hidden from view as well as publicly viewable by all TikTok users. Default value : ALL .

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Specific field to sort comment replies by. Enum values : likes : Sort comment replies by the number of likes in the specified sort_order . replies : Sort comment replies by the number of replies in the specified sort_order . create_time : Sort comment replies chronologically in the specified sort_order . By default, the comment replies will be returned in a random order.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specific field to sort comment replies by. Enum values : asc : Sort comment replies in ascending order by the specified sort_field . desc : Sort comment replies in descending order by the specified sort_field . By default, the comment replies will be sorted according to semantics.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for pagination. If the response parameter has_more is true, pass the returned cursor in this parameter in the subsequent request to receive the next page of results. Default value : 0.

parameters.name: max_count
parameters.description: The maximum number of comment replies that will be returned for each page of data. Default value : 20. Minimum value : 0. Maximum value : 30. Note : Due to our trust and safety policies, it is possible that the endpoint returns less than the max_count number of comments even if the response parameter has_more is true.

top_fields.name: Date
top_fields.description: Date and time (GMT) when the response was received. Example : Fri, 13 Aug 2021 08:04:42 GMT

top_fields.name: X-Tt-Logid
top_fields.description: Unique identifier for the API request.

item_fields.name: request_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the API request. Please record this field for all API requests. Important for issue reports and troubleshooting.

item_fields.name: code
item_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix - Return Codes .

item_fields.name: message
item_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Information .

item_fields.name: data
item_fields.description: Returned data.

item_fields.name: comments
item_fields.description: List of current page of replies to the specified comment created on the specified video.

item_fields.name: comment_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the reply. Example : 6990565363377392901.

item_fields.name: parent_comment_id
item_fields.description: The ID of the comment to which the reply ( comment_id ) is directed. Example : 6990565363377392901.

item_fields.name: video_id
item_fields.description: Unique identifier for the owned video the reply was created on. Example : 6990565363377392901.

item_fields.name: user_id To-be-deprecated
item_fields.description: Developer application and TikTok account scoped unique identifier for the user that made the reply. Example : ce9b7be629b0447af777a0ad945783f61b7f790982b49fbda04a23b4722eaffe. Note : This field will be deprecated in the next API version. We recommend using unique_identifier to identify the TikTok user because the identifier remains consistent across different APIs.

item_fields.name: unique_identifier
item_fields.description: A globally unique identifier assigned to each user commenting. This identifier remains consistent across different APIs, facilitating cross-referencing and integration. Example : +ABc1D2/E0fGhijklMNOrD34vDW/zDiZUNRH5Jyahue6OcA7b8ZpwnqXV9u1Uh+k.

item_fields.name: create_time
item_fields.description: Unix/Epoch date-time when the reply was created. Example : 1627617835.

item_fields.name: text
item_fields.description: Text content of the reply. Example : "This is a reply #reply ðŸ™‚".

item_fields.name: likes
item_fields.description: Number of likes the reply has received. Example : 123.

item_fields.name: replies
item_fields.description: Number of replies the reply has received. Example : 123.

item_fields.name: owner
item_fields.description: Whether the current application user owns the reply. Example : true .

item_fields.name: liked
item_fields.description: Whether the current application user likes the reply. Example : true .

item_fields.name: pinned
item_fields.description: Whether the current application user pinned the reply. Example : true .

item_fields.name: status
item_fields.description: The visibility status of the reply. Possible values : HIDDEN : The reply is hidden from public viewership. PUBLIC : The reply can be viewed by all users. Example : PUBLIC .

item_fields.name: username
item_fields.description: The username of the TikTok user who made the reply.. Example : feather_in_the_w1nd.

item_fields.name: display_name
item_fields.description: The display name of the TikTok user who made the reply. Example : Feather in the wind

item_fields.name: profile_image
item_fields.description: The avatar link for the account. It will expire at the x-expires Unix/Epoch date-time in the link. Example : https://p16-sign-va.tiktokcdn.com/tos-maliva-avt-0068/188d468fc1de3f328250ea0c96e98f8b~c5_168x168.jpeg?x-expires=1651687200&x-signature=AAiHg70%2Bnj9iUipTuQWodRmk0qA%3D.

item_fields.name: cursor
item_fields.description: Cursor for the next page of results, to be passed in the cursor query parameter of the subsequent API request.

item_fields.name: has_more
item_fields.description: Whether an additional page of data is available.
